org.apache.mina.filter.traffic

Class WriteFloodException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.io.IOException
          • org.apache.mina.common.WriteException
            • org.apache.mina.filter.traffic.WriteFloodException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IoFloodException

    public class WriteFloodException
extends WriteException
implements IoFloodException
    An exception that is thrown by WriteThrottleFilter when there are too many scheduled write requests or too much amount of scheduled write data in an IoSession's internal write request queue.
    Version:
    $Rev: 591600 $, $Date: 2007-11-03 12:32:13 +0100 (Sat, 03 Nov 2007) $
    Author:
    The Apache MINA Project (dev@mina.apache.org)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
